auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to continue your IELTS preparation
auth.termsAgreement: By continuing, you agree to our
auth.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your account

error.loginFailed: Failed to sign in. Please try again.

hero.title: Ace Your IELTS with
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive IELTS preparation for Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking. Get AI-powered feedback and targeted practice to achieve your target band score.

features.title: Everything You Need to Ace IELTS
features.subtitle: Comprehensive preparation tools designed to help you achieve your target IELTS band score efficiently.

tracking.title: Progress Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor your improvement across all four IELTS skills with detailed analytics and band score predictions.

ai.title: AI-Powered Feedback
ai.description: Get instant, examiner-style feedback on your Writing and Speaking practice sessions.

practice.title: Targeted Practice
practice.description: Focus on your weak areas with IELTS-format exercises and full mock tests.

vocabulary.title: IELTS Vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Build essential IELTS vocabulary with smart spaced repetition and AI-powered context learning.

skills.title: Master All Four IELTS Skills
skills.subtitle: Our comprehensive approach ensures balanced preparation across Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking for the IELTS exam.
skills.listening: Practice with authentic IELTS-style audio materials including lectures, conversations, and monologues.
skills.reading: Improve your reading speed and accuracy with academic passages and IELTS question types.
skills.writing: Master Task 1 and Task 2 with structured practice, model answers, and detailed feedback.
skills.speaking: Build confidence with AI-powered mock speaking tests and pronunciation feedback.

cta.title: Ready to Ace Your IELTS?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of test-takers who have achieved their target band score with AceIELTS.

vocabulary.noUserBooks: You haven't created any vocabulary books yet

importTooltip.failedDetails: {{failed}} out of {{total}} words failed to import

vocabulary.importBlocked: This book is currently being imported. Please wait for the import to complete.

import.blockedHint: Please wait for import to complete
import.tooltipWait: Please wait for the import to finish before accessing this book.
import.tooltipRetryHint: Click the Retry button to attempt importing the failed words again.

errors.fetchFailed: Failed to load vocabulary books. Please try again.
errors.importInProgress: This vocabulary book is currently being imported. Please wait for the import to complete before accessing it.

createBook.title: Create New Vocabulary Book
createBook.description: Create a custom vocabulary book by uploading a word list (one word or phrase per line).
createBook.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of this vocabulary book
createBook.wordsPlaceholder:
Enter words, one per line:
apple
banana
orange
...
createBook.wordsHint: Enter one word or phrase per line

errors.wordsRequired: Please add at least one word
errors.createFailed: Failed to create book. Please try again.

bookDetail.fsrsHint: Powered by FSRS-4.5 spaced repetition algorithm

settings.title: Book Settings
settings.description: Customize your learning experience for this vocabulary book
settings.dailyNewLimitHint: Maximum number of new words to learn each day (default: 20)
settings.dailyReviewLimitHint: Maximum number of words to review each day (default: 60, 3x of new words)
settings.readOnlyHint: Read and understand words without spelling
settings.spellingHint: Require correct spelling when marking words as 'known'
settings.studyOrderHint: Choose whether to study words in order or randomly

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load settings. Please try again.
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
errors.invalidNewLimit: New words limit must be between 5 and 200
errors.invalidReviewLimit: Review words limit must be between 1 and 1000

encouragement.streak_low: Every journey begins with a single step. Keep practicing!
encouragement.streak_medium: You're building a great habit! Consistency is key to IELTS success.
encouragement.streak_high: Amazing dedication! Your IELTS preparation is on track.
encouragement.streak_legendary: Unstoppable! You're well on your way to acing the IELTS!

levelDescription.4: Limited User â€” Basic competence in familiar situations
levelDescription.4.5: Limited User â€” Improving gradually with limited vocabulary
levelDescription.5: Modest User â€” Partial command, can handle basic communication
levelDescription.5.5: Modest User â€” Growing competence in routine situations
levelDescription.6: Competent User â€” Generally effective despite some inaccuracies
levelDescription.6.5: Competent User â€” Good command with occasional errors
levelDescription.7: Good User â€” Operational command with occasional inaccuracies
levelDescription.7.5: Good User â€” Strong command, minor errors in unfamiliar contexts
levelDescription.8: Very Good User â€” Fully operational command, rare inaccuracies
levelDescription.8.5: Very Good User â€” Exceptional command in all contexts
levelDescription.9: Expert User â€” Full operational command, native-like proficiency

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.notAvailableInSaaS: Settings are not available in SaaS mode. Please use self-hosted mode to configure API keys.

llmProvider.title: LLM Provider
llmProvider.description: Choose your preferred LLM provider for vocabulary enrichment
llmProvider.label: Provider
llmProvider.hint: Select the LLM provider you want to use. Currently, only Gemini is fully supported.

llmApiKey.title: LLM API Key
llmApiKey.description: Configure your LLM API key for vocabulary enrichment (self-hosted mode only)
llmApiKey.label: API Key
llmApiKey.hint: Your API key is encrypted and stored securely. It will be used to enrich vocabulary words with definitions, examples, and more.

geminiConfig.title: Gemini Model Configuration
geminiConfig.description: Configure Gemini text and TTS model parameters

textModel.title: Text Model Settings
textModel.temperatureHint: Controls randomness (0.0 = deterministic, 2.0 = very random). Default: 0.7
textModel.topKHint: Number of tokens to consider (1-40). Default: 40

ttsModel.title: Text-to-Speech Model Settings
ttsModel.hint: Select the Gemini TTS model for generating pronunciation audio

errors.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
